description:
Wang Wei (Chinese: 王卫; pinyin: Wáng Wèi; born October 1970) is a Chinese billionaire entrepreneur, who is the founder and chairman of SF Express, a Shenzhen-based multinational delivery services and logistics company.
As of November 9, 2022, Wangwei is the sixth-wealthiest man in China, with a networth of US$19.6 billion.[
